description: This file sets up an agent to interact with OpenAI's API, specifically to generate and stream a horror story response asynchronously.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent configured to interact with OpenAI models, capable of running prompts and streaming responses.

classes.name: RunResponseEvent
classes.description: Represents an event in the response stream from the agent.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes a prompt with the agent, optionally streaming the response.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response to a prompt.
